job.title: Fullstack .NET Developer
job.description:
**About the company**

The mission of Innostep-IT is to develop unique software solutions based on the expert knowledge of our partners.
In this way, continuous optimisation and innovation potential are realised. We rely on strong partnerships to create lasting value and to guarantee top quality, service and performance.

We are always looking to improve and try new approaches, so we never end up where we started. Our approach is an agile organisation with feedback loops and continuous improvement. For our customers and for us.

We have established ourselves as a successful business partner for medium-sized companies in the retail, logistics and public sectors. We also develop our own scalable products based on this foundation.

**What we offer**

- Interesting projects
- Small, motivated team with fast decision making
- Remote working

**Personal profile requirements**

- Speaks fluent English
- Nice to have: speaks German
- Amazing communication skills
- Agile mindset
- Team player
- Highly self-organised
- Delivering high quality working solutions

**Technical profile requirements**

- Experience with Design Patterns (Gang of Four)
- Experience of domain-driven design
- Experience with microservices development
- Minimum 3 years experience with .NET Core / .NET 6+
- Experience with Web API implementation
- Nice to have: Angular + Typescript experience

**Tasks**

- Analysis of customer problems
- Concept of solutions
- Estimate effort
- Software development (mostly greenfield)
- Create automated software tests (unit test & integration test)
- Internal framework development (standardisation)
- Task board maintenance
- Bug analysis and resolution (2nd level support)
- Maintenance of software projects (package updates)

**Tools**

- Rider / Resharper
- VS Code
- Git
- Azure DevOps
- Docker
- Nice to have: Azure cloud skills

**Next step**

Submit your application now and become part of our ambitious journey!

questions.question: Design Patterns/Domain-Driven Design: Describe a project using Design Patterns or Domain-Driven Design. Which patterns/principles did you use?
Microservices Development and .NET: Share an example of a microservices project with .NET Core/.NET 6+. How did you ensure efficiency, scalability, and maintainability?
Agile Mindset and Teamwork: Provide an instance where your agile mindset and teamwork were crucial. How did you incorporate feedback and continuous improvement?
Describe your recent experience with similar projects
What frameworks have you worked with?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled Fullstack .NET Developer to join our team for a project duration of 3 to 6 months. As a Fullstack .NET Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using C#, ASP.NET Core, and ASP.NET.

To be successful in this role, you should have a strong understanding of software development principles and experience in developing scalable and responsive web applications. You should also be proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

If you are interested in this project, please submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to the project's success. Additionally, we would appreciate if you could provide links to some of your past completed projects that demonstrate your expertise in Fullstack .NET development.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the right candidate to join our team.
